body_html:
Hi @josh11b we are trying to embed TF to our application. we are define graph with python, train the graph with a C++ application.

Tensorboard is great tool to visualize graph and metrics, since we are not train with python api we can't use summary file writer. A solution would be define summary with python and fetch in C++, so I need a name to fetch summary output, then I found that the name is not assignable, that is the reason behind this PR.

Hi @josh11b  we are trying to embed TF to our application. we are define graph with python, train the graph with a C++ application.
Tensorboard is great tool to visualize graph and metrics, since we are not train with python api we can't use summary file writer.  A solution would be define summary with python and fetch in C++, so I need a name to fetch summary output, then I found that the name  is not assignable, that is the reason behind this PR.
body:
Hi @josh11b  we are trying to embed TF to our application. we are define graph with python, train the graph with a C++ application.  

Tensorboard is great tool to visualize graph and metrics, since we are not train with python api we can't use summary file writer.  A solution would be define summary with python and fetch in C++, so I need a name to fetch summary output, then I found that the name  is not assignable, that is the reason behind this PR.
